text: Ebam utera duti o garura duti. Baluna, ‘nara duti'i ki tini nisid'dha karechena kimba madi duti'i athaba madi dutira garbhe ya ache ta? Naki allaha yakhana tomaderake esaba nirdesa dana karena takhana tomara upasthita chile?’ Kaje'i ye byakti na jene manusake bibhranta karara jan'ya allah‌ sambandhe mithya ratana kare tara ceye bara yalima ara ke? Niscaya allaha yalima sapradayake hidayata karena na
